6 Day Split - Arnold Split

Monday - Chest/Back SetsxReps Tuesday - Delts/Arms SetsxReps Wednesday - Legs SetsxReps Thursday - Chest/Back SetsxReps Friday - Delts/Arms SetsxReps Saturday - Legs SetsxReps
Bench Press 3x5-8 Overhead Press 3x5-8 Squat 3x5-8 Bench Press 3x5-8 Dumbbell Overhead Press 3x8-10 Deadlift 3x5
Barbell Row 3x8-10 Barbell Curl 4x8-10 Romanian Deadlift 4x8-10 Barbell Row 3x8-10 Preacher Curl 4x8-10 Front Squat 4x5-8
Incline Bench 3x8-10 Skullcrusher 4x8-12 Hack Squat 3x8-10 Cable Fly 3x12-15 Close Grip Bench 4x12-15 Hamstring Curl 3x12-15
Lat-Pulldown 3x8-10 Concentration Curl 4x12-15 Hamstring Curl 4x12-15 Pull-up 3x8-10 Hammer Curl 4x12-15 Split Squat 4x12-15
Cable Fly 3x12-15 Tricep Pushdown 4x12-15 Leg Extension 3x12-15 Machine Bench 3x12-15 Dips 4x12-15 Calf Raises 5x12-15
Cable Row 3x12-15 Dumbbell Lateral Raises 3x12-15 Calf Raises 5x12-15 Single Arm Row 3x12-15 Cable Lateral Raises 3x12-15 Cable Crunches 4x12-15
Decline Sit-up 5x15-20 Cable Lateral Raises 3x12-15 Cable Crunches 4x15-20 Leg Raises 5x15-20 Cable Lateral Raises 3x12-15
